speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Marina thus the brothel 'scapes, and chances

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Into an honest house, our story says.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: She sings like one immortal, and she dances

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: As goddess-like to her admired lays;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Deep clerks she dumbs; and with her needle composes

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Nature's own shape, of bud, bird, branch, or berry,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: That even her art sisters the natural roses;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Her inkle, silk, twin with the rubied cherry:

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: That pupils lacks she none of noble race,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Who pour their bounty on her; and her gain

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: She gives the cursed bawd. Here we her place;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: And to her father turn our thoughts again,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Where we left him, on the sea. We there him lost;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Whence, driven before the winds, he is arrived

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Here where his daughter dwells; and on this coast

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Suppose him now at anchor. The city strived

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: God Neptune's annual feast to keep: from whence

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Lysimachus our Tyrian ship espies,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: His banners sable, trimm'd with rich expense;

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: And to him in his barge with fervor hies.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: In your supposing once more put your sight

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Of heavy Pericles; think this his bark:

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Where what is done in action, more, if might,

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Shall be discover'd; please you, sit and hark.

speaker: GOWER
text_entry: Exit
